title: lfg
body:
lfg = looking for group, long story short ima  41 year old guy medically retired left hand is a mess due to many breaks and injuries so i often play with 1 hand, sometimes i play with 2, i mostly support, but i am looking for people around my rank or higher to group with either norms or ranked to improve, im not picky but if ranked i dont want silver 4 or 5 it tankst he mmr to much but if norm i'd norm with any rank, add me
i dont rage i ame asy going, i have all voice chat's or can get them. just looking for people to group with

replies.body:
well any rank for normals bronze - challenger but ranked yea silver- plat
and on the hand thing i was in car accident as a kid a few times again i was a passanger not my fault others were idiot work accidents again not my fault

probably shoulda had that hand properly and fully healed before you went back and broke it again

and by "any rank" you mean silver-plat right?
